Items.Title: A Local Law in relation to the date of issuance and publication by the Mayor of a ten-year capital strategy, the date of submission by the Mayor of the proposed executive budget and budget message, the date of submission by the Borough Presidents of recommendations in response to the Mayor’s executive budget, the date of publication of a report by the director of the independent budget office analyzing the executive budget, the date by which the Council hearings pertaining to the executive budget shall conclude, the date by which if the expense budget has not been adopted, the expense budget and tax rate adopted as modified for the current fiscal year shall be deemed to have been extended for the new fiscal year until such time as a new expense budget has been adopted, the date by which if a capital budget and a capital program have not been adopted, the unutilized portion of all prior capital appropriations shall be deemed reappropriated, the date of submission by the Mayor of an estimate of the probable amount of receipts, the date by which any person or organization may submit an official alternative estimate of revenues, the date by which if the Council has not fixed the tax rates for the ensuing fiscal year, the commissioner of finance shall be authorized to complete the assessment rolls using estimated rates, and related matters, relating to the fiscal year two thousand fourteen.
Items.ActionName: Hearing on P-C Item by Comm
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing on P-C Item by Comm

Items.Title: Linden Harman, Block 3278, Lot 36, Block 3322, Lot 28, Brooklyn, Community District No. 4, Council District Nos. 34 and 37.
Items.ActionName: Hearing on P-C Item by Comm
Items.ActionText: This Land Use Application was Hearing on P-C Item by Comm
Items.MatterName: Linden Harman, Block 3278, Lot 36, Block 3322, Lot 28, Brooklyn.

Items.Title: AND SUCH OTHER BUSINESS AS MAY BE NECESSARY

A Local Law in relation to the date of issuance and publication by the Mayor of a ten-year capital strategy, the date of submission by the Mayor of the proposed executive budget and budget message, the date of submission by the Borough Presidents of recommendations in response to the Mayor’s executive budget, the date of publication of a report by the director of the independent budget office analyzing the executive budget, the date by which the Council hearings pertaining to the executive budget shall conclude, the date by which if the expense budget has not been adopted, the expense budget and tax rate adopted as modified for the current fiscal year shall be deemed to have been extended for the new fiscal year until such time as a new expense budget has been adopted, the date by which if a capital budget and a capital program have not been adopted, the unutilized portion of all prior capital appropriations shall be deemed reappropriated, the date of submission by the Mayor of an estimate of the probable amount of receipts, the date by which any person or organization may submit an official alternative estimate of revenues, the date by which if the Council has not fixed the tax rates for the ensuing fiscal year, the commissioner of finance shall be authorized to complete the assessment rolls using estimated rates, and related matters, relating to the fiscal year two thousand fourteen.
Items.ActionText: A motion was made that this Introduction be P-C Item Approved by Comm approved by Roll Call.

Items.Title: Linden Harman, Block 3278, Lot 36, Block 3322, Lot 28, Brooklyn, Community District No. 4, Council District Nos. 34 and 37.
Items.ActionName: P-C Item Approved by Committee with Companion Resolution
Items.ActionText: A motion was made that this Land Use Application be P-C Item Approved by Committee with Companion Resolution approved by Roll Call.
Items.MatterName: Linden Harman, Block 3278, Lot 36, Block 3322, Lot 28, Brooklyn.
